selectCard(ActionEvent) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.ViewGUIController

selectPositionInGameField(ActionEvent) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.ViewGUIController
This method is associated to the click on each button on the game field In based on the variable state it can do different things If the state is 4, it's used to assign a position to each worker and then send this two boxes to the server If the state is 5, it's used to choose which worker the player want to move and the send an ObjWorkerToMove to the server If the state is 7, it's used to chose the position where the user wants to move the worker and send onn ObjMove to the server If the state is 10, it's used to print the possible blocks the user can build after he chooses the position

subscribeObserver(Observer) - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Subject
 
surePaneNo(ActionEvent) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.ViewGUIController
This method is associated with a button used to allowed the player to change some choice If the state is 6, when the button is clicked means that the player wants to change the worker to move and it's used to recall the method askWorker to allow the player to make another choice If the state is 8, when the button is clicked means that the player chose to move without build If the state is 9, when the button is clicked means that the player chose to not move again If the state is 11, when the button is clicked means that the player chose to not build again
surePaneYes(ActionEvent) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.ViewGUIController
This method is associated with a button used to ask confirm to some choice of the player If the state is 6, when the button is clicked means that the player is sure about the worker to move chosen and to send an ObjWorkerToMove object to the server If the state is 8, when the button is clicked means that the player chose to build before making a move If the state is 9, when the button is clicked means that the player chose to move again If the state is 11, when the button is clicked means that the player chose to build again
SwitchWorker - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.god
This class implements the ability to switch the position with an enemy worker
